question_stem:
Q3. How to explore the association between the response bbd and pmh (multiple answers)
Box plot of pmh for two groups of bbd
Contingency table with conditional probabilities of having breast cancer for different categories of pmh
Odds ratio
Correlation coefficient of pmh and bbd
